mapper.select: select od.order_seq as orderSeq , mp.name as productName, mp.image as productImage, mp.brand as productBrand, od.option_name as optionName ,to_char(o.reg_dt, 'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss (DY)') as regDt , od.quantity as quantity, to_char(mp.price * od.quantity, '999,999,999,999') as orderPrice , order_status as orderStatus from order_details_tbl2 od, order_tbl2 o, men_product_tbl2 mp where od.order_seq = o.seq and od.product_seq = mp.seq and o.user_id = #{userId} order by regdt desc
